title: SealManifest
description: Sealed, auditable manifest binding LockedSpec, gate verdicts, evidence references, and waivers to a final repository state. Cryptographic anchor (Tier 2â€“3) is provided by an Ed25519 detached signature over the content-hash binding fields; final_commit_sha is informational and is not part of the anchor.

waivers.description: References to waiver artifacts (may be empty).

final_commit_sha.description: Final repository commit SHA for operator reference (SHA-1: 40 hex, or SHA-256: 64 hex). This value is informational and is not part of the cryptographic anchor.

signature_alg.description: Detached signature algorithm identifier for the cryptographic anchor.

signature.description: Base64-encoded Ed25519 signature over the canonical JSON of the anchor object (see operations/evidence-bundles.md).

replay_instructions_ref.description: Optional reference to replay instructions/pointers for reproduction.

storage_ref.description: Local, repo/bundle-relative POSIX path only. MUST NOT start with '/'. MUST NOT contain '..', '*', '?', '\\', '://', ':', '//', or './'.

ObjectRef.description: Stable reference to an external object (id + hash + storage reference).
